document.full_text: portugal sold 1.65 billion euros in an extraordinary sale of short-term bonds on friday, but analysts said its high cost of borrowing was still likely to force it into an international bailout within months.
document.title: crisis-hit portugal buys some time with bond sale
lines_and_colors: portugal sold 1.65 billion euros in an extraordinary sale of short-term bonds on friday, but analysts said its high cost of borrowing was still likely to force it into an international bailout within months.
